text: "Paradis perdus" (English: Lost Paradise) is a song by Christine and the Queens. It was released as a digital download in June 2015 through Because Music as the fourth and final single from her debut studio album Chaleur Humaine (2014). The song was written by Christophe and Jean Michel Jarre. The song interpolates American rapper Kanye West's 2008 single "Heartless" as well as Christophe's 1973 song "Les Paradis Perdus".Christine And The Queens Sort Of Covers Kanye's Heartless In Paradis Perdus Video.
